Product Information

VERSACE DYLAN TRIO 24 X

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
A trio of Versace's delightful Dylan fragrances for her: Elegant Dylan Blue, refreshing Dylan Turquoise and sparkling Dylan Purple.

This set contains:
- Dylan Blue Eau de Parfum Spray (5ml)
- Dylan Turquoise Eau de Toilette Spray (5ml)
- Dylan Purple Eau de Parfum Spray (5ml)
